alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Meagher County Valleys; Northern Blaine County; Northern High Plains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 8:11PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest period of snow is expected tonight into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
